overview: Hannah was kicked out of home at 16 by her mother, Agatha. She has spent this time finding peace within herself. When Hannah's brother Mark contacts her after 15 years to donate a kidney to Agatha, she finds herself feeling like she's 16 again. She's bound by the notion of family and feels compelled to help her mother, but can't shake the feeling that it isn't the right thing to do.
title: Only the Good Die Young
